docs.summary: The JoinRequests API provides functionality for managing requests to join a group.
description: The JoinRequests API provides functionality for managing requests to join a group.
> **Note:** This module is only relevant for private groups. When a group's `privacyStatus` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `PUBLIC`, all pending join requests for that group are automatically approved.
When a group's `privacyStatus` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `SECRET`, all pending join requests for that group are automatically rejected.
To enable groups backend API functionality for your site, add the [Wix Groups](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-groups-adding-and-setting-up-wix-groups) application to your site.
### Settings for Typical Use Case

+ Group members with group `admin` permissions determine who can join their group by setting their group [privacy level](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-groups-about-groups#your-groups-privacy-permissions).
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `PRIVATE`, a site member can request to join the group on your site's Groups List page.
+ Only a group members with group `admin` permissions can approve or reject site member requests to join the group.
+ When a site member's request to join the group is approved, the member is added to the group.
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `PUBLIC`, a site member can join the group (no request necessary).
+ If a group's privacy level is set to `SECRET`, only site members added by an existing group member can join the group (no request necessary).
The JoinRequests API provides functionality allowing you to:
+ [Approve](wix-groups-backend.joinRequests/approvejoinrequests) requests to join a group.
+ [List](wix-groups-backend.joinRequests/listjoinrequests) requests to join a group.
+ [Query](wix-groups-backend.joinRequests/queryjoinrequests) requests to join a group.
+ [Reject](wix-groups-backend.joinRequests/rejectjoinrequests) requests to join a group.
Permissions Information:
|Functions|Permissions

| `approveJoinRequests()`, `listJoinRequests()`,
`queryJoinRequests()`, `rejectJoinRequests()`|Site owner, Site admin, Group admin
To use the JoinRequests API, import `joinRequests` from the `wix-groups-backend` module:
```javascript
import { joinRequests } from "wix-groups-backend";

docs.summary: Approves requests to join a group.
description: > **Note: This function is only relevant for private groups.**
The `approveJoinRequests()` function returns a Promise that resolves when a site member's request to join a group is approved.
Only site admins, and group members with group `admin` permissions can approve requests to join their group.

examples.title: Approve a request to join a group

params.name: groupId
params.doc: ID of the group requested to join.

docs.summary: Lists requests to join a group.
description: > **Note: This function is only relevant for private groups.**
The `listJoinRequests()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a list of up to 100 requests to join a group. Sorts by default to `_createdDate` in descending order.
Only site admins, and group members with group `admin` permissions can see requests to join their group. Site members can access their own join requests in their site.

examples.title: List all requests to join a group

ret.doc: A `JoinRequestsQueryBuilder` object that contains the refined query.

docs.summary: Creates a query to retrieve a list of join requests.
description: > **Note: This function is only relevant for private groups.**
Only site admins, and group members with group `admin` permissions can query requests to join their group.

The `queryJoinRequests()` function builds a query to retrieve a list of all requests to create a group, and returns a [JoinRequestsQueryBuilder](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestquerybuilder) object.
The returned object contains the query definition which is typically used to run the query using the [`find()`](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/find) function.

You can refine the query by chaining `JoinRequestsQueryBuilder` functions onto the query. `JoinRequestsQueryBuilder` functions enable you to sort, filter, and control the results that `queryJoinRequests()` returns.
`queryJoinRequests` runs with these `JoinRequestsQueryBuilder` defaults, which you can override:
+ [`limit(100)`](wix-groups-backend/joinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/limit)
+ [`ascending("_createdDate")`](wix-groups-backend/joinRequests/createrequestsquerybuilder/ascending)
The following `JoinRequestsQueryBuilder` functions are supported for `queryJoinRequests()`.

| Property                    | Supported Filters & Sorting                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

| `status`                    | [`eq()`](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/eq), [`ne()`](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/ne), [`hasSome()`](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/hasSome), [`or()`](wix-groups-backend.JoinRequests/joinrequestsquerybuilder/or)                                |

examples.title: Query requests to join a group

params.name: groupId
params.doc: ID of the group requested to join.

docs.summary: Rejects requests to join a group.
description: > **Note: This function is only relevant for private groups.**
The `rejectJoinRequests()` function returns a Promise that resolves when the site member's request to join a group is rejected.
Only site admins, and group members with group `admin` permissions can reject requests to join their group.

examples.title: Reject a request to join a group
body: //    reason: 'I don't want you to join this group.'
*   "rejectionReason": "I don't want you to join this group."

members.name: groupId
members.doc: ID of the group requested to join.

members.name: memberIds
members.doc: IDs of the site members to approve.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Site member ID of the requester.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the request to join a group.
One of:
- `"PENDING"` 
- `"APPROVED"` 
- `"REJECTED"`

members.name: rejectionReason
members.doc: Reason the request to join a group was rejected.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of join requests to retrieve. Defaults to 100.

members.name: skip
members.doc: Number of join requests to skip in the list.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of the site member to reject.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason the request to join a group was rejected. Free text that is displayed to the creator of the rejected group request (max 1,000 characters).
